item.description:
Let's go ice skating to start off the winter season. We will have some dim sum lunch first, then we head out to Frog Pond in Boston Common for ice skating. Cost for admission $4 per person, Skate Rental $8. for more information about the Frog Pond, please go to this site http://www.bostoncomm....

we will meet at China Pearl about 11 am, please be punctual if you are joining us for Dim Sum. The cost for Dim Sum will approximately about $10 -15 per person.

Please indicate in your RSVP note if you like to join us for Dim Sum only or both. See you there.

Susan
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting in second floor entrance area

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum and Ice Skating
